author: agemanning
content: Doesn't the spec say the mcache Len is 6? We should store for 6 heartbeats and only gossip about messages in the last 3 heartbeats

author: nishant0
content: Yeap that is correct, but with heartbeats being 0.7 seconds , I wonder having a buffer of 3 heartbeats would be enough to fulfill all requested `IWANT` messages

author: agemanning
content:
Sure. If you are seeing unfulfilled promises I'm not opposed to increasing the memcache Len. We could set it to 12, just increases ram usage a bit. 
Are you seeing failed promises from all clients?

author: nishant0
content: Yeap, i wanted to maybe try this out in toledo and see if increasing the mcache length helps. We probably dont need to double it to 12 but 7, 8 would help. I have just seen it for prysm and nimbus so far. The only lighthouse ones I have seen are from v0.2.x , which i am assuming has the older mesaage id format. So i am disregarding it for now
